mapper.select: SELECT * FROM itjob.job_opening jot JOIN itjob.company ct ON ct.index =jot.com_index WHERE jot.com_index = #{com_index} ORDER BY jot.ongoing DESC, ABS(DATE(jot.due)- CURDATE()) ASC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ct.`index`,ct.i_index, ct.name, ct.headcount, ct.division, ct.found_date, ct.capital, ct.sales, ct.bussiness,ct.url, ct.address, ct.ceo, ct.ind_detail,ct.logo_url, jot.`index` as jot_index, jot.com_index, jot.career, jot.background, jot.employ, jot.etc, jot.due, jot.ongoing, jot.`require`, jot.title, jot.region FROM itjob.job_opening jot LEFT JOIN itjob.company ct ON ct.`index` =jot.com_index LIMIT 18446744073709551615 ) AS result ORDER BY result.ongoing DESC , result.index ASC,result.jot_index ASC
mapper.update: update itjob.job_opening jot set ongoing = CASE WHEN (DATE(jot.due)-CURDATE()) = 0 THEN 3 WHEN (DATE(jot.due)-CURDATE()) > 0 THEN 2 WHEN jot.due IS NULL THEN 1 WHEN (DATE(jot.due)-CURDATE()) < 0 THEN 0 END
